name: INAddMediaIntentResponseCode
desc: Codes returned by an app or Intents app extension when handling or confirming an add media intent.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: The app is ready to add media.

items.name: case inProgress
items.desc: The app is currently trying to process the add media request.

items.name: case success
items.desc: The app successfully added the media.

items.name: case handleInApp
items.desc: The system should launch the app in the background to handle the intent.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: The app was unable to add the media.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunch
items.desc: The user must launch the app to add media.
